statements.select:
SELECT ROW_NUMBER() OVER (ORDER BY AA.ID) AS RowNo , AA.ID , AA.CreatedOn , AA.CreatedBy , AA.CreatedByName , AA.UpdatedOn , AA.UpdatedBy , AA.UpdatedByName
, AA.ChannelID , AA.AttributeTypeID , AA.AttributeID , AA.AttributeValue
, BB.Name as AttributeTypeName , CC.Name as AttributeName
FROM dbo.TChannelAttribute AA WITH (NOLOCK) INNER JOIN dbo.TAttributeType BB WITH (NOLOCK) ON AA.AttributeTypeID = BB.ID INNER JOIN dbo.TAttribute CC WITH (NOLOCK) ON AA.AttributeID = CC.ID WHERE AA.ChannelID = #ChannelID# ORDER BY RowNo
SELECT * FROM dbo.TChannelAttribute AA WITH (NOLOCK) WHERE AA.ID = #ID#
statements.insert:
INSERT INTO dbo.TChannelAttribute ( CreatedOn, CreatedBy, CreatedByName, ChannelID, AttributeTypeID, AttributeID, AttributeValue ) VALUES ( GetDate(), #CreatedBy#, #CreatedByName#, #ChannelID#, #AttributeTypeID#, #AttributeID#, #AttributeValue# )
SELECT @@IDENTITY AS ID
statements.update:
UPDATE dbo.TChannelAttribute SET UpdatedOn = GetDate() , UpdatedBy = #UpdatedBy# , UpdatedByName = #UpdatedByName#
, ChannelID = #ChannelID# , AttributeTypeID = #AttributeTypeID# , AttributeID = #AttributeID# , AttributeValue = #AttributeValue# WHERE ID = #ID#
